name: NefariOS
description:
Someone's computer is being torn apart by a virus, and they've hired you to get their important files off it before they're lost. Unfortunately, they're using NefariOS, the most egregiously unintuitive operating system ever devised. And you might stumble upon a bit more than the files you've been told to find... including things you've been told not to find.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Lost and Found."

  • Kat Witten - Backend programming, frontend programming, modeling
  • Timmy Yang - Sound design, lighting design, writing, photography
  • Diane Sparks - Frontend programming, writing, modeling, sound design
  • Brandon Nguyen - Voice Acting

Source code is here.
